vclaim: If carried out, President Donald Trump's 12 November proposal to finalize the election night results of two contests in Florida would exclude ballots mailed by U.S. military personnel overseas.
title: Would a Proposal by President Trump Exclude Overseas Military Votes in Florida’s Elections?
subtitle: If it was carried out, the president's call to finalize the preliminary election results before 16 November would discount ballots cast by Floridians overseas.
author: Dan MacGuill
